name: Double-Sided Adventure
description:
This is a platformer game where the level can be turned inside-out. There are three levels. Play as a small squishy purple blob, because I spent like two hours trying to make a decent character before deciding I didn't want a decent character anyway.

Created for Weekly Game Jam 77, the theme being "Inside Out".

Controls: Left and right arrows (or A and D), Space to jump, Up (or W) to flip level

And, to anyone that reads this, Happy New Year!
